did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: William B. Provine collection of evolutionary biology reprints, 20th century.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Reprints collected by William B. Provine, Andrew H. and James S. Tisch Distinguished University Professor in the Department of Ecology and Evolutionary Biology at Cornell University.

descgrp.head: INFORMATION FOR USERS

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: William B. Provine collection of evolutionary biology reprints, #6776. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

descgrp.p: Some authors have multiple entries if they have publications in more than one box

arrangement.head: COLLECTION ARRANGEMENT
arrangement.p: This forms a portion of collection #6776. The guide to the entire collection is available here.

did.unittitle: Authors last name beginning with the letter "X"
